Prefect Kasman: Ohh! So, you came here to see me to seek learning? Your faith touches even me, Kasman! From now on, I will teach you everything I know with all my heart. Study hard and distinguish yourself in cleansing this chaotic world, where*lower Orcs* stand unchallenged.
